AstroMax is a comprehensive design, redesign, and development service that specializes in crafting exceptional one-page websites to captivate users and leave a lasting impression.

I specialize in developing static websites using Astro and Tailwind CSS. By leveraging these frameworks, I create tailored and optimized websites that effectively share startup stories, connect with audiences, and create memorable experiences. Let me help you achieve your goals with a remarkable online presence.

services; Explained

UI/UX Focus:

Ensuring all projects align with user-centric design principles, delivering sleek, intuitive experiences that resonate with end users.

Platform Redesigns and Migrations:

Expertise in platform migrations, including Fleetio’s transition to a modern frontend architecture, boosting performance and scalability.

Accessibility Standards:

Certified in WCAG standards, ensuring that every project meets high accessibility benchmarks using tools like JAWS, NVDA, and Lighthouse.

Agile Development and Leadership:

Leading frontend teams in agile environments, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and driving technology adoption.
